description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. An awesome multiplayer shooter, featuring 4-player deathmatch and randomly-generated fully-destructible terrain!  It's great fun, you have to try it!  Avoid the black holes, collect the crazy powerups and drive your friends INSANE! (friends sold separately.) You'll keep coming back for more insanity!
